data.title: Afghanistan Anthem Text Lyrics by National Anthem
data.meta_description: Afghanistan Anthem Text Lyrics, National Anthem, So long as there is the earth and the heavens;So
data.text:
Clean Lyric

Paragraph Lyric

So long as there is the earth and the heavens;So long as the world endures;So long as there is life in the world;So long as a single Afghan breathes;There will be this Afghanistan.Long live the Afghan nation.Long live the Republic.Forever there be our national unity;Forever there be the Afghan nation and the Republic.Forever the Afghan nation, the Republic and National Unity-National UnitySent by Carlos AndrÃ© Pereira da Silva Branco
